nycTheatreExcerpt: Admittedly, though, there isn't a lot to unpack here (it ain't "Chess"), but the show thankfully feels both simple and honest. (Again, it ain't "Chess.") Most of all, I can think of no two people better equipped to carry this delightful musical than Sam Tutty and Christiani Pitts. Let's hope they don't stay strangers to the Broadway stage.
